item.title: I want the quest sidebar open the combat sidebar instead of the quest interface
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:6, topic:553978”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=672900.msg4499790#msg4499790 date=1448988125]
Then change the interface ID? This is basic stuff you should already know strucker…
[/quote]Actually i did know how to do it, i was just wondering if it could be done somehow client sided, but nevermind, thanks tho[/quote]
If you wanted to know if it could be done client sided, why did you ask in the server help?

Read full topic
